sentence.Network_en: Then he will judge the same anecdote in psychoanalytical terms , giving it a different dimension.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后他又用精神分析的术语从完全不同的角度对这一故事进行评价.

sentence.Network_en: There are no psychoanalytical shortcuts into my pants , okay?
sentence.Network_cn: 你以为你能把我分析到你床上去?

sentence.Network_en: As a novelist, Stefan Zweig was influenced by Freudian psychoanalytical theories.
sentence.Network_cn: 茨威格的小说创作受到了弗洛伊德心理学理论的影响.
